We work for our rizq.
But we guard our hearts while doing so.

Compare less in dunya, so gratitude grows.
Compare higher in akhirah, so faith rises.

Grateful for what Allah has given.
Striving for what brings us closer to Him.

We believe that as Muslim Entrepreneurs we have to develop in 3 different areas to be able to reach our fullest potential, and these areas are:
1. The body
2. The Mind
3. The Soul

How does this help in our Entrepreneurial journey?

Keeping all of these in check helps us be more balanced individuals and it helps us think clearly to take proper actions!
What else can we do to become better Muslims & better entrepreneurs? Let us know in the comments!
